relevant_findings.physical_exam: S3 gallop, 2+/H11001 pitting lower extremity edema

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: He initially presented with ejection fraction of 25% and 6.3 cm left ventricular end-diastolic diameter, which progressed to 15% ejection fraction and 7.5 cm diameter.
Jugular venous pressure improved from 16 cm H2O to 8 cm H2O and creatinine decreased from 2.0 mg/dL to 1.5 mg/dL after treatment.
